snippet: Although the details have yet to be verified, a spokeswoman for a separatist group said rebels had taken five members of the plane’s crew as hostages.
abstract: Ukrainian officials say Russian military transport plane was shot down over eastern Ukraine, while new reports emerge that Russia is building up forces along border with Ukraine.

byline.contributor: David Herszenhorn contributed reporting from Moscow, and James Kanter from Brussels.

lead_paragraph: Although the details have yet to be verified, a spokeswoman for a separatist group said rebels had taken five members of the plane’s crew as hostages.

headline.main: Ukrainian Military Plane Is Shot Down as Russia Adds to Presence at Border
headline.print_headline: Ukrainian Military Plane Is Shot Down as Russia Adds to Presence at Border
